feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 16 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening then changing to light snow overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 16 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
